module.name: hostname
module.summary: Policy for changing the system host name.

interface.name: hostname_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute hostname in the hostname domain.

interface.name: hostname_run
interface.summary: Execute hostname in the hostname domain, and allow the specified role the hostname domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the hostname domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the hostname domain to use.

interface.name: hostname_exec
interface.summary: Execute hostname in the caller domain.
